item.description:
Hello Music Fans,

Great Big Sea, a band from Newfoundland will be visiting Boston for an intimate show at the Orpheum Theatre. If you have not had the opportunity to see Great Big Sea then I would highly recommend coming to this show.

We'll meet before the show for a bite to eat at the Beantown Pub.

If you are interested in coming please buy your tickets online through ticketmaster Great Big Sea
Hope you can make it.

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Beantown for a bite to eat before the show

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Great Big Sea - October 24, 2008
